title: How People Generate Narratives?
description: Investigated theoretical links between narrative production and comprehension using neural network literature review (SNU, Mar.–Jun. 2023).

title: Development of Dependent Noun Termination Composition 'Deut'
description: Compared modern and historical usage of 'Deut'; proposed revised definition and development process (SNU, Sep.–Dec. 2022).

title: Effect of Practice Test Form on Essay Evaluation Results
description: Designed and conducted experiment on open vs. closed book test formats on essay grading (SNU, Sep.–Dec. 2022).

title: Learning Effects of Neologism’s Modulation Method
description: Measured N400/P600 amplitude in response to neologisms using EEG and behavioral data (SNU, Sep.–Dec. 2021).

title: Cheonan City Data Analysis Idea Competition
description: Urban development proposals using infrastructure public data (Jul. 2024).

title: SNU Liberal Arts Competition – Grand Prize
Ambient AI Competition
description: Fashion recommendation system using VGG16 and MLP (Dec. 2022 – Jan. 2023).

title: SNU Multidisciplinary Essay Contest – Encouragement Prize
description: Essay on the value of interdisciplinary study across five majors (Apr. 2022).

title: SNUMentalCare Leadership
description: Led a 24-member team for campus-wide mental health projects (Sep. 2021 – Jul. 2023).
